alert.note: Alert for Macon; Smith; Trousdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 2:14AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Smith, southwestern Macon and central Trousdale Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 214 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hartsville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Hartsville, Pleasant Shade and Dixon Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Brief heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized minor flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
